meanings.definition: relating to or affected by color blindness
meanings.sent1: The daltonic artist painted a beautiful landscape using only shades of gray.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was daltonic when he couldn't distinguish between red and green.
meanings.sent3: The daltonic chef accidentally added blue pepper instead of black pepper to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her world became a daltonic painting, devoid of vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The daltonic child saw the world in a different light, where colors blended into one another.

meanings.definition: a person who is color blind
meanings.sent1: The daltonic in the group always asked for help to match his clothes.
meanings.sent2: As a daltonic, he struggled to read color-coded charts accurately.
meanings.sent3: The daltonic at the party accidentally wore mismatched socks, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a daltonic in a world full of vibrant rainbows.
meanings.sent5: The daltonic's unique perspective on the world fascinated his friends.
